stimulusHtml: The image depicts which of the following developments?

features.html: Schomburg Center for Research in Black Culture, Manuscripts, Archives and Rare Books Division, The New York Public Library.

choicesHtml: Maroon communities consisting of formerly enslaved and free-born Africans formed around the Americas and Caribbean.
Maroon communities within southern plantations helped enslaved Africans maintain traditions and cultural practices.
Maroon communities in northern United States cities allowed African Americans to create institutions.
Maroon communities became wealthy from trading goods and captives taken from interior states.
